objects.name: Phrase1
objects.string:
Ew! Cold water! How did I get here?
          I was just having a picnic with a cool bunch on the beach
Maybe I can find other bottles? I’ve heard about the Garbage Patches.

objects.name: Phrase2
objects.string:
90% of us end up there.
If fish don’t eat you before. Or if you don’t lose air and slowly sink to the seabed. 
                                             Brrr… let’s get out of here. Quick!
